Class BoardPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • BoardPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class BoardPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Class that acts as the Panel to display the model (board).
    Author:
    Edgar Padilla, Oscar Galindo, Mario Delgado
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        The function sets to a different color the color to draw Disks of player 1.
        Parameters:
        int - r sets the red degree of the desired color.
        int - g sets the green degree of the desired color.
        int - b sets the blue degree of the desired color.
